line.text: O that you were your self but love you are
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No longer yours than you your self here live
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against this coming end you should prepare
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And your sweet semblance to some other give
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So should that beauty which you hold in lease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Find no determination then you were
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Your self again after your self decease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When your sweet issue your sweet form should bear
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Who lets so fair a house fall to decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which husbandry in honour might uphold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Against the stormy gusts of winter day
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And barren rage of death eternal cold
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O none but unthrifts dear my love you know
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: You had a father let your son say so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
